description:
CHARMING 1930s GROUND FLOOR APARTMENT OF 77M² (GFA 86M²) WITH A PARTICULARLY SPACIOUS LIVING ROOM, TWO BEDROOMS, TWO BATHROOMS, AND A LOVELY SOUTH-FACING GARDEN. THE PROPERTY IS LOCATED IN A QUIET STREET IN THE SOUGHT-AFTER STADIUM NEIGHBORHOOD!

This delightful ground-floor apartment is located in a building from 1931 and is in good condition. The property features an expansive living room at the front and two good-sized bedrooms. Additionally, the apartment has a perfect layout and the leasehold has been bought out until mid-2055. The cozy south-facing garden completes this apartment.

The homeowners' association “Donar, Argonauten, and Agamemnonstraat” is professionally managed. The service costs are €172.77 per month.

LAYOUT
Through its private entrance, with a vestibule and a wardrobe area, a beautifully crafted glass door leads into the spacious hallway. The hallway has a large storage room with a washing machine connection, a separate toilet, and provides access to all the rooms.
The charming living room is located at the front of the building. This room is particularly spacious and offers ample space for both a generous seating area and a good-sized dining area. The living room features two large windows, ensuring pleasant natural light. Between the windows is a built-in bookcase.

From the hallway, you reach the closed kitchen at the rear. It is set up on two sides and equipped with glossy white cabinets with stainless steel handles, combined with a wooden countertop. The kitchen also includes several built-in appliances and access to the cozy south-facing garden.
The master bedroom is also located at the rear. This bedroom features a full-height, wall-wide built-in wardrobe with a TV connection and includes an en-suite bathroom. French doors give access to the aforementioned garden. The en-suite bathroom is equipped with anthracite-colored floor tiles and fully tiled white walls. The bathroom features a walk-in shower with both a rain shower and a hand shower, along with a wide wooden vanity unit and matching mirrored cabinet.

The garden has an area of 13.5m², is south-facing, and is fully tiled. A nice detail is the sheltered seating area. Finally, the garden includes a large garden shed that houses the central heating system.

At the front of the apartment, the second bedroom is located. This room includes a custom-made loft bed, under which a desk can be placed, or a cozy lounge area can be created. The room also has a good built-in wardrobe with automatic lighting.

The second bathroom is accessible from the hallway. It features an anthracite tile floor and partly tiled white walls with a black border. It includes a shower and a small sink.

The entire apartment is fitted with wooden floors and double-glazed window frames.

LOCATION & ACCESSIBILITY 
This apartment is ideally located at the edge of the city, in the charming and quiet Stadium neighborhood. The building is situated at the corner of Van Tuyll van Serooskerkenplein. The area is known for being calm, child-friendly, and a close-knit community. With the newly developed Stadionplein, Stadionweg, and the nearby Beethovenstraat, you have all the options for daily shopping or enjoying lunch, drinks, or dinner. The shopping options are certainly diverse. Besides the well-known supermarkets, there are also various specialty shops (e.g., Le Fournil, Marqt, Brood, Alexanderhoeve). The Stadium neighborhood almost borders the high-end shopping center Gelderlandplein, with the Stadshart in Amstelveen nearby. On the other side, the neighborhood is adjacent to the upscale Oud-Zuid and the vibrant De Pijp. You can relax in the beautiful Beatrixpark or the famous Vondelpark. Several schools, childcare, and sports facilities are within walking distance, as well as public transport and various roads.

PARKING 
On the public road, there is paid parking and parking is available through a permit system. According to information from the website of the Municipality of Amsterdam, there is no waiting list for a parking permit (waiting list data as of February 26, 2025, permit area Zuid 2.2). Two permits are allowed for this permit area.

SPECIAL FEATURES
•	Charming and perfectly laid out 3-room ground-floor apartment of 77m²
•	Spacious living room with large windows at the front
•	Two good-sized bedrooms
•	Two bathrooms
•	Pleasant south-facing garden
•	Leasehold bought out until mid-2055
•	Located in the cozy and quiet Stadium neighborhood
•	Professionally managed homeowners’ association
•	Service costs of €172.77 per month
•	Two parking permits possible
•	Delivery in consultation, can be done soon.

description:
SPACIOUS, BRIGHT, AND WELL-LAID-OUT 5-ROOM APARTMENT OF 85M² WITH TWO BALCONIES AND A SUNNY ROOFTOP TERRACE OF 23M². THE PROPERTY IS LOCATED ON THE THIRD AND FOURTH FLOORS OF A BEAUTIFUL CHARACTERISTIC BUILDING FROM THE 1930S.

The property is located in the popular Rivierenbuurt, between Haringvlietstraat and Scheldestraat. The lively Maasstraat, with a wide variety of shops and restaurants, is also within walking distance.

The Owners' Association of Grevelingenstraat 2, 4 & 6, Volkerakstraat 2, 4 & 6, and Deurloostraat 59, 61 & 63 in Amsterdam consists of 38 apartments. The HOA is professionally managed by Minerva Vastgoedbeheer. The service fees are €203 per month, and there is a Multi-Year Maintenance Plan in place.

LAYOUT
You reach the communal entrance on the first floor via a beautiful stone outdoor staircase. The wide staircase leads to the entrance of the apartment on the third floor. Upon entering the hallway, there is a separate toilet with a sink and a spacious storage cupboard. At the front is the bright living room with a natural stone fireplace and charming alcove. At the rear is the cozy living kitchen, with enough space for a large dining table and access to the south-facing balcony. The neat kitchen features a stone countertop and various built-in appliances, including a dishwasher, oven, fridge/freezer, and a 4-burner gas stove.

An internal staircase leads to the landing on the fourth floor, which provides access to all rooms. At the rear is a spacious bedroom with access to a south-facing balcony. At the front are two bedrooms of varying sizes, each with a high open roof structure and a skylight. In the center of the floor is the luxurious bathroom with a skylight. The bathroom features a walk-in shower with a rain shower, washbasin, toilet, and connections for a washing machine and dryer.

From the landing, a fixed staircase leads to the 23 m² roof terrace. This sunny and secluded roof terrace offers a spectacular view of the Amsterdam South skyline. Due to the generous size of the terrace, there is plenty of space for a large dining table and a comfortable lounge area. There is also a connection for water and electricity.

The entire apartment has plastered walls and wooden flooring.

LOCATION & ACCESSIBILITY
The property is located in a beautiful 1930s neighborhood in Amsterdam Zuid, the Rivierenbuurt. Various shopping opportunities are within walking distance in Maas- and Scheldestraat. There are numerous cozy cafes and restaurants in the vicinity. The property is also conveniently located for public transport (including Station RAI). By bike, the beautiful Beatrixpark, the lively Albert Cuypmarkt, and the city center of Amsterdam are easily accessible. By car, there is good access to the A10 Ring Road via Europaboulevard and to the A2 via Utrechtsebrug.

PARKING
Paid parking applies on the public road via a permit system. According to the information on the City of Amsterdam website, there is a short waiting list for obtaining a parking permit (waiting list data as of January 10, 2025, South 4.1 Rivierenbuurt North area).

SPECIAL FEATURES
- Spacious living floor;
- Three good-sized bedrooms;
- Sunny roof terrace and 2 south-facing balconies;
- Located on leasehold land, which has been bought off until July 31, 2052;
- The transition to perpetual leasehold under favorable conditions has already been made;
- The seller has not personally occupied the property in recent years. A "Non-occupancy clause" applies;
- Fast delivery possible.

If you have specific wishes regarding the property, we advise you to make them known to your purchasing broker in a timely manner and to independently (have them) investigate them. If you do not engage an expert representative, you consider yourself, by law, sufficiently expert to oversee all matters of importance. The NVM conditions apply.

The usable area is calculated according to the industry-standard NEN 2580 standard. The area may therefore differ from comparable properties and/or old references. This is mainly due to this (new) calculation method. The buyer declares to be sufficiently informed about the aforementioned standardization. description:
Onstein 16 – Spacious and bright 2-bedroom apartment with two balconies in Buitenveldert!  

Looking for a move-in ready apartment in a prime location? This fully renovated 2-bedroom apartment at Onstein 16 has it all! With a brand-new kitchen, bathroom, and flooring, you only need to unpack your boxes. Thanks to the large windows and two balconies – one facing east for the morning sun and one facing west for the afternoon and evening sun – you'll enjoy natural light all day long. Living in the popular Buitenveldert area, close to Gelderlandplein and the Amsterdamse Bos, means ultimate living comfort. Interested? Schedule a viewing today!  

Layout  
Ground floor  
The apartment complex offers a well-maintained entrance with access to the storage rooms in the basement.  

Apartment at the 3rd floor
The hallway gives access to all rooms, immediately showcasing the sleek finishes and natural light.  

On the right side, you'll find the completely renewed kitchen, equipped with Inventum appliances, an induction cooktop, extractor fan, and boiler. From the kitchen, you step onto the east-facing balcony – perfect for your morning coffee in the sunshine.  

The spacious living room offers ample space for both a sitting and dining area and opens onto the west-facing balcony, ideal for soaking up the sun after work.  

The apartment has two well-sized bedrooms. The first bedroom at the front features large windows and plenty of daylight. The second bedroom is perfect as a guest room, home office, or extra bedroom.  

The modern bathroom has been fully renovated and features a walk-in shower and stylish vanity. The toilet is separate, providing extra comfort.  

In the basement, you'll also find a large storage room for additional space.  

Ground type  
Leasehold (perpetual).  
- Annual ground rent until July 15, 2037: € 165.62.  
- Annual ground rent from July 16, 2037: € 458.39 (2024), indexed yearly.  

Location  
This apartment is located in Buitenveldert, a quiet, green neighborhood in Amsterdam-Zuid. For daily shopping and more luxurious retail therapy, the Gelderlandplein shopping center is just minutes away, offering various supermarkets, boutiques, and restaurants such as Le Pain Quotidien and Bar Kaspar.  

For relaxation or outdoor activities, both the Amsterdamse Bos and Amstelpark are nearby. The Gijsbrecht van Aemstelpark is also around the corner, perfect for a walk or run.  

Accessibility is excellent: Amsterdam Zuid/WTC station is nearby, offering direct train and metro connections to Schiphol, Utrecht, and Amsterdam's city center. By car, you can reach the A10 within minutes, with easy access to Schiphol, Haarlem, or The Hague.  

HOA  
The VVE is professionally managed by Falcon VVE Management. The monthly service costs are € 200.88 excluding an advance payment of € 112.50 for the advance heating costs.

Energy (EPA)  
Seller will provide energy label C to the buyer upon transfer.  

List of moveables  
As indicated on the list of moveables.  

Delivery  
In consultation.  

Key features  
- Living area: approx. 86 m²  
- Energy label C  
- Two balconies: morning and evening sun  
- Fully renovated with new kitchen, bathroom, and flooring  
- Double-glazed throughout  
- Spacious storage in the basement  

Clauses  
The purchase agreement will include an asbestos clause, a non-occupancy clause, and an age clause.

description:
Luxury and Spacious Family Home with Extension and Sunny Southwest-Facing Garden – with Perpetually Bought-Off Leasehold!

This stylish and extended family home offers optimal living comfort with a 136 m² plot, a private covered carport, and a sunny southwest-facing backyard. The property is located in a quiet and child-friendly neighborhood and features a modern, luxurious kitchen with high-quality built-in appliances.

Surroundings
The neighborhood is known for its spacious layout and green surroundings, allowing you to enjoy peace and space while having all urban amenities within easy reach.

The location is ideal for public transport (bus, metro, and NS train stations) and major highways such as the A9, A10, A1, and A2. Within five minutes, you can reach the De Kameleon shopping center for daily groceries, and nearby you will find the AMC hospital, the Amsterdam Arena, Ziggo Dome, AFAS Live, and Pathé Arena. For nature lovers, Gaasperplas, Bijlmerweide, and the Diemerbos are within walking or cycling distance.

Additionally, you benefit from the recent developments around the Gaasperdammerweg, where the highway has been tunneled, and a beautiful new city park, Brasa, has been created on top.

This summer, the OBA Next library will open next to Kraaiennest metro station.

Layout
Ground floor:
Spacious entrance hall with staircase and modern toilet with washbasin. The extended living room is bright and spacious, providing direct access to the sunny southwest-facing backyard. The luxurious and modern kitchen at the front is equipped with various built-in appliances, including two fridge-freezer combinations (two refrigerators and two freezers), a dishwasher, an induction cooktop with a gas wok burner, an oven, a microwave, and a wine cooler. Additionally, there is a fixed storage cupboard with extra space and a washing machine connection.

First floor:
Landing with access to three spacious bedrooms. The bathroom features a walk-in shower, sink, and designer radiator.

Garden:
Spacious front yard with a stone shed and a private covered carport in the courtyard. The sunny backyard faces southwest, allowing you to enjoy the sun almost all day long.

Special Features:
Extended living room
Luxurious kitchen with wine cooler and modern built-in appliances
136 m² plot
Perpetually bought-off leasehold!
Sunny southwest-facing backyard
Private covered carport
Quiet and child-friendly neighborhood with lots of greenery

description:
Beautifully renovated ground floor house (55m2) with garden, on private land in the beautiful Van Oldenbarneveldtstraat in the popular Frederik Neighborhood in Amsterdam West. The entire building has been renovated and is peacefully located around the corner from the Jordaan and the city center. The house has been completely remodeled and has a great garden attached to the kitchen. Curious about this nice ground floor house? Watch the video and schedule an appointment!

SURROUNDINGS
The house is located in the popular Frederik Hendrikbuurt, on the edge of the Jordaan and the city center. The Hugo de Grootplein with shops and restaurants, the Westerstraat and Noordermarkt are within walking distance. The Marnixbad and the Westerpark with all its cultural and culinary activities are a 5-minute bike ride away. Several restaurants and bars are around the corner, like Morgan & Mees, Spaghetteria and Van 't Spit. The neighborhood also has many facilities such as schools, child daycare and cultural venues.
The apartment is easily accessible with various bus and tram lines within walking distance and you can reach one of the main roads within 5 minutes by car.

ENTRANCE
From the street you step directly into your own home. In front of the door, the neighbors have created an extra green strip and placed two picnic tables, for the real Amsterdam neighborhood feeling.

LIVING & KITCHEN
The living room and open kitchen are at the rear end of the house. A skylight has been installed in the extension, allowing a lot of extra light to enter.

The white kitchen is in a corner arrangement and has a sturdy concrete worktop. All equipment is from the A-brand SMEG. The kitchen has a 5-burner gas stove, convection oven and dishwasher. There is an oak floor throughout the apartment.

GARDEN
From your kitchen you step straight into the garden through the patio doors. The garden is 8 meters deep, so there are plenty of opportunities for a sunny spot. Dining outside and barbecuing on summer evenings is certainly possible.

BEDROOM
The bedroom is located at the front of the apartment. There is enough space for a double bed and a wardrobe.

BATHROOM
The stylish white bathroom has a washbasin, toilet and spacious walk-in shower.

STORAGE
The house has a surprising amount of storage space. Next to the bathroom is a storage room with a washing machine connection, central heating boiler and enough space for storage.

PARTICULARITIES
+ Light and completely renovated ground floor apartment of 55m2
+ Super location in a beautiful building and a quiet street
+ Deep garden of 35m2 on the west
+ Own land, so no leasehold
+ Private entrance from the street
+ Luxury bathroom and SMEG equipment in the kitchen
+ Low heating costs and well insulated
+ Professional management by Velzel Management, MJOP present
+ Delivery is possible quickly, in consultation

For more information, watch the video, digital brochure and map. To schedule an appointment, feel free to call the office: 020 - 210 1048 or send an email. For specific questions you can contact the selling broker: Susanne Dijkstra

description:
This spacious third-floor apartment (with a floor surface area of 111m²) is very bright, due to its corner position and large windows. And because it is so high, it commands great views of the Zuidas district. Beethovenstraat, with its wide range of quality retail outlets, exclusive delicatessens, and friendly bars and restaurants, is just around the corner, as is the beautiful Beatrixpark.

LAYOUT
Entrance in the building and access to the lift and staircase. The front door to the apartment is on the third floor. You enter into the hall, with the kitchen on the right, which gives access to one of the balconies. Also on the right is the second bedroom. A wardrobe for coats and jackets is on the left of the hall.
A notable feature of the living room, which is situated at the corner part of the building, is the numerous large windows. Because the buildings on Willem Kesstraat are low-rise, the windows afford clear views towards the west. There are also several tall trees near the corner of the building. The living room has a seating area adjacent to the south-facing balcony, from where the buildings in the Zuidas district can be seen. 
The second bedroom is the master bedroom, next to which is a walk-in wardrobe: more accurately, the walk-in wardrobe has been created from what used to be another bedroom. 
The toilet is situated in the hall. The bathroom, which can be accessed from both the master bedroom and the hall, has a shower, sink, and connections for a washing machine.
There is double glazing throughout the property.

On the ground floor of the building are two sizeable storage spaces, with a combined surface area of around 17m². They can be easily accessed by bike, thanks to the presence of a second access door that opens out directly onto the street.

Communal heating is used to heat the apartment, with radiators fitted with calorimeters. Hot water is provided by means of a boiler in the apartment.

LOCATION
The property is located in a quiet part of the Prinses Irenebuurt neighbourhood. It is just around the corner from the Zuidas district, Beatrixpark, Gelderlandplein, and the shops on Beethovenstraat.
Thanks to the position of the apartment on the corner of the building and the presence of the large trees nearby, the feeling is almost one of living outside - peaceful and with plenty of greenery.
Public transport is within easy walking distance. Trams run along Beethovenstraat and Station Zuid is also close by, which is a major hub for a large number of train and metro routes.

OWNERS’ ASSOCIATION
The owners’ association has 17 members and is managed professionally by Ter Linden en Heijer. The current service charges are €430.17 per month. There is a long-term maintenance plan in place and the owners’ association is registered with the Chamber of Commerce. 

LEASEHOLD
The building is on municipal leasehold land. The ground rent is €198.30 per year - this is until 2030. The transfer to a perpetual lease has been concluded. After 2030, the ground rent will be €1,526.83 per year, plus inflation.

PARTICULARS
- Floor surface area of around 111m², measured in accordance with the NEN 2580 standard
– Single-storey apartment reachable by lift
- Bright apartment due to its position on a corner
- Two balconies
- Two spacious bedrooms, with potential for creating a third bedroom very easily
- Double glazing fitted throughout
- Two storage areas on the ground floor
- Ground rent is €198.30 per year until 31 August 2030, after which it will be €1,526.83 per year in perpetuity
- Active and professionally managed owners’ association, with a long-term maintenance plan
- Service charges of €430.17 per month, excluding advance payment for the communal heating
- Energy Label E
Transfer can be arranged at short notice

The deed of sale will include a general ‘age and asbestos clause’ (whereby the purchaser confirms that he/she is aware of the age of the building, and accepts responsibility for any defects that occur in relation thereto) and a ‘non-residential clause’ (whereby the purchaser confirms that he/she is aware that the vendor has not lived in the property him/herself, and therefore may not have the first-hand knowledge of any defects that a resident may be expected to have).

description:
Dit uitstekend verzorgde en instapklare 2+1-kamer appartement met berging biedt alles wat je zoekt: ruimte, comfort en een uitstekende ligging. Met twee ruime slaapkamers, een stijlvolle open keuken en een lichte woonkamer is dit de ideale woning voor starters en kleine gezinnen.

Indeling
Bij binnenkomst in het gebouw word je verwelkomd door een centrale entree met intercom, vanwaar je met de trap of lift naar de verdieping van het appartement gaat.

Via de voordeur kom je in de hal, die toegang biedt tot twee ruime slaapkamers, een wasruimte, een separaat toilet en de badkamer. De lichte woonkamer profiteert van grote raampartijen die zorgen voor veel natuurlijk daglicht. Hier is voldoende ruimte om gezellig te loungen en dineren. De woonkamer loopt naadloos over in de open leefkeuken, die modern en stijlvol is afgewerkt met greeploze witte kasten, een donker werkblad en sfeervolle verlichting. De keuken is uitgerust met een inductiekookplaat, afzuigunit, combi-oven, inbouwkoelkast met vriesvak, vaatwasser en een horecakraan.

Zowel de woonkamer als de keuken bieden toegang tot een balkon, waar je kunt genieten van een ontspannen moment in de buitenlucht. Het balkon is voorzien van terrasvlonders en een overkapping, wat het een fijne plek maakt om te loungen met uitzicht over de buurt.

De badkamer heeft een moderne en luxe uitstraling met een wastafelmeubel en een douchecabine met regendouche. De afwerking met donkere marmerlook wanden en lichte tegels zorgt voor een chique uitstraling.

De slaapkamers zijn momenteel ingedeeld als een master bedroom en een kinderkamer, maar bieden meerdere mogelijkheden, zoals een werkkamer of inloopkast.

Locatie
De ligging van dit appartement is ideaal. Je woont hier boven winkels, waardoor je boodschappen binnen handbereik hebt. Daarnaast vind je in de buurt diverse supermarkten, horecagelegenheden en andere voorzieningen. De bereikbaarheid is uitstekend, met bus- en tramhaltes op loopafstand en uitvalswegen zoals de A5, A9 en N232 in de nabijheid.

Bijzonderheden:
– Instapklaar en uitstekend verzorgde woning
– Twee ruime slaapkamers
– Moderne open keuken met inbouwapparatuur
– Energielabel A en volledig geïsoleerd
– Blokverwarming
– Sfeervol balkon met overkapping
– Wasruimte en separaat toilet
– Wonen boven winkels

description:
Living in an OASIS OF PEACE and GREENERY in AMSTERDAM, with all the facilities and amenities of the city just a stone's throw away?
This is possible in this beautiful, DETACHED VILLA of approximately 186 m² (incl. attic of 12m2). Situated on FREEHOLD LAND in a private residential cul-de-sac with 9 other villas. ENERGY EFFICIENT (energy label A).
BY THE WATER, with a large garden surrounding the property and 4 PARKING SPACES ON PRIVATE LAND. Behind the plot, there is a nature reserve, ensuring you always enjoy a green and unobstructed view. There are connections to other green/natural areas, such as the WESTERN GARDENS, with its pick-your-own gardens, organic market, and dining establishments.

THREE BEDROOMS, a large attic, and a HOME OFFICE on the ground floor.
The spacious layout on the ground floor offers various possibilities to make this house suitable for all stages of life, such as converting the office into a bedroom and the utility room into a bathroom.

GENERAL
Through the closed gate, you reach the private residential cul-de-sac, leading to the access gate of the 575 m² plot where the house is situated.
You enter the house via the entrance, which provides access to the living area, the toilet with a washbasin, and the staircase to the first floor.

LIVING
Upon entering the living area, you are immediately struck by the generous size and the light, sunny character of the space. With windows on four sides, natural light pours in. The finish is of high quality, with sleek walls. The sliding door provides access to the terrace.
The dimensions of the living room are exceptionally generous and easily accommodate a large dining table, a lounge area, and a TV corner. The focal point is the fireplace with a classical mantelpiece, adding extra warmth and ambiance in winter. Shutters are fitted to all windows in the house, providing cooling in the summer months.
The floor, covering over 90 m², features a beautiful, low-maintenance PVC floor (installed in 2025) with underfloor heating.

COOKING
For those who enjoy cooking, this kitchen truly has it all. The 6-meter-long ceramic worktop provides exceptional workspace, and the drawer cabinets offer ample storage. The kitchen is of high quality, with built-in appliances (Siemens brand), an induction hob with a separate wok burner, a combination steam and convection oven, and a second convection oven. There is also a dishwasher, an extractor hood, and a Quooker for optimal comfort and convenience.
The adjacent utility room offers extra storage space and room for a fridge-freezer. The utility room has a door to the outside.

WORKING
At the front of the villa, there is a spacious study, with its own access via the utility room. This room is ideal as a home office and could easily be converted into a bedroom in the future. By converting the utility room into a bathroom, this house can easily be made suitable for all stages of life.

SLEEPING
On the first floor, there are three bedrooms: the large master bedroom at the rear (formerly two bedrooms), a bedroom at the side of the house (currently used as a dressing room), and a well-sized bedroom at the front. The charming master bedroom features a dormer window, an automatic roller shutter, and Velux roof windows. The floor is finished with high-quality solid oak wood. Here, you have complete privacy and a fantastic, unobstructed view of the greenery of the Western Gardens.
The second floor is accessible via a fixed staircase, and this spacious attic (approximately 12 m² in height) offers plenty of storage space, with connections for a washing machine and dryer.

BATHING
The bathroom on the first floor is luxuriously finished, with a jacuzzi bathtub, a walk-in shower, a toilet, and two sinks. The space is beautifully tiled up to the ceiling. The large tilt window allows for natural daylight and ventilation.

OUTSIDE
The house is detached and has a paved, low-maintenance garden surrounding it. There are various terraces, so there is always a spot in the sun or shade at any time of day. At the front, you look out over the water, offering a peaceful retreat after a long day’s work.
Adjacent to the living area is a large terrace with a glass canopy and heater, perfect for enjoying a cup of coffee or a glass of wine in early spring.
At the back of the garden, there is a storage unit from Biohort for bicycles and gardening tools. The side of the house has space for parking four cars.

LOCATION
The location of this house is truly unique: close to the vibrancy of central Amsterdam and Haarlem, yet set amidst greenery, next to the Western Gardens. This diverse recreational area consists of four polders: the Osdorper Binnenpolder North and South, the Osdorper Bovenpolder, and the Lutkemeerpolder.
The area combines old and new landscapes and offers a mix of art, culture, urban farming, hospitality, nature, and recreation.
For amenities such as schools, shops, childcare, and doctors, you can choose between Amsterdam or the nearby Zwanenburg/Halfweg.
Public transport links are excellent, with Halfweg-Zwanenburg station just 7 minutes by bike, offering trains to Amsterdam and Haarlem Central four times an hour. Buses to Haarlem and Amsterdam stop nearby. Via the N200, you can reach Amsterdam, Haarlem, and Schiphol in just a few minutes by car.

HIGHLIGHTS
-Built in 1999;
-Plot size of approximately 575 m² freehold land;
-Living area of approximately 186 m²;
-Located in a private residential cul-de-sac with video intercom, consisting of ten homes;
-The maintenance of the cul-de-sac is managed by a Homeowners’ Association. The service -charge is €100,- per month;
-Three bedrooms, large attic, and home office;
-New flooring (2025) on the ground floor;
-Energy label A; 
-New HR boiler from 2024;
-Parking for 4 cars on private land;
-Delivery in consultation.

description:
Deze woning aan de Pandorinastraat in Amsterdam biedt volop mogelijkheden! Gelegen in de populaire en rustige wijk Kadoelen, kenmerkt de buurt zich door de vriendelijke en dorpse architectuur binnen de ringweg A10. Het is een ideale locatie voor wie de rust van een dorpsgevoel zoekt, maar toch dicht bij de stad wil wonen.

In de nabije omgeving vindt u diverse winkels voor uw dagelijkse benodigdheden, uitstekende scholen en het prachtige natuur- en recreatiegebied het Twiske  biedt volop mogelijkheden voor buitensporten, wandelingen en fietstochten, en in de zomer kunt u genieten van de strandjes. De openbaar vervoerverbindingen met Amsterdam Centrum zijn uitstekend, zodat u snel en gemakkelijk in de stad bent.

De woning zelf ligt op eigen grond en biedt een uitstekende basis, maar dient nog gemoderniseerd te worden, zodat u het helemaal naar eigen smaak kunt inrichten. Daarnaast zijn er volop mogelijkheden om de woning uit te breiden, zowel op de begane grond als met een dakopbouw, waardoor u de ruimte kunt vergroten en het nog verder kunt personaliseren.

Bijzonderheden:
- Woonoppervlakte van 73 m²
- Bouwjaar 1956
- Gelegen op eigen grond (geen erfpacht)
- Mogelijkheden voor uitbouw op de begane grond
- Mogelijkheid voor het plaatsen van een dakopbouw
- Gewilde locatie in Kadoelen, dichtbij natuur, scholen en het Twiske
- Uitstekende verbinding met Amsterdam Centrum via openbaar vervoer

Of u nu op zoek bent naar een project om uw ideale woning te creëren of een investering voor de toekomst, deze woning biedt het allemaal in een gewilde locatie. Grijp de kans om in een van de leukste buurten van Amsterdam uw nieuwe thuis te maken!

description:
Beautiful double upper house with an abundance of light, a warm atmosphere, lots of space and a great roof terrace, centrally located in the popular Amsterdam West area!

The house was renovated in 2018 and has a living area of approximately 112 m² spread over the third and fourth floors of the building, a spacious and bright living area with patio folding doors to the sunken balcony at the rear, no fewer than 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 bathrooms! The beautiful roof terrace of approximately 25m² is a wonderful place with a beautiful panoramic view of the city.

The location of the house is perfect, a short distance from the city center and the Jordaan. Close to  several highways and two beautiful green parks. Around the corner from many nice restaurants, cafes and shops, this is a wonderful place to enjoy Amsterdam.

Make an appointment quickly with Makleaar Alex for a viewing!

Layout:
The private entrance is on the second floor. You will then be welcomed on the third floor. Here you will find three spacious bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of which is en-suite. The bedroom at the front is spacious and has a large built-in wardrobe. The modern and big bathroom en-suite is luxuriously finished and equipped with a walk-in shower, bath, double sink and toilet. The bathroom has underfloor heating. 
The spacious bedroom at the rear of the apartment has a balcony and is equipped with a large closet. Adjacent to the same balcony we find the third bedroom, which can also serve as an office. All rooms have plenty of light. On this floor there is also a second bathroom with a walk-in shower and sink as well as a toilet.

You reach the fourth floor via the beautiful staircase. You immediately notice the nice, spacious living area, wonderfully light and open. The living room is located at the rear and flows seamlessly into the dining area. Here you also have access to the spacious balcony which can be reached through the patio doors. This balcony is located on the East. 
The open kitchen is adjacent to the dining area and is a modern equipped kitchen that offers sufficient storage and work space. We offer a 6-burner gas stove with oven, quooker, refrigerator, freezer and dishwasher. There is also a separate washer/dryer and storage cupboard adjacent to the kitchen. .

Via the stairs you reach the roof terrace on the fifth floor, a beautiful place to enjoy the fresh air. There is enough space here for both a comfortable seating area and a dining area. The panoramic view of the surroundings is never boring. 

Environment:
The apartment is located in Amsterdam West. The location is close to the center and a short distance from many shops, supermarkets, the Ten Katemarkt, De Hallen and sports facilities. Many conceivable city facilities are within walking distance, such as shops, bars, many nice coffee shops and trendy nice restaurants. You can do your daily shopping on the other side of the Jan van Galenstraat at the AH. There are also several parks nearby, both the Erasmus Park and the Rembrandt Park are within a few minutes' walk or cycling.

Accessibility:
The location of this apartment offers excellent accessibility. The nearby entrances and exits of the A10 are easy to reach by car. Public transport is also very accessible, and you can reach the center of Amsterdam in 5 minutes by bike.

description:
A spacious three room apartment of 80 m² on the 6th floor, located in the heart of trendy and dynamic Amsterdam-North. Here you live in a green and lively area, with all amenities within easy reach. The apartment has a storage room and possibly a private covered parking space. 

The layout is as follows; 
Upon entering you will find a well-kept central entrance that provides access to the apartments, with both a staircase and an elevator and are also located here the mailboxes. With the elevator or stairs you reach the sixth floor, where you reach the front door of the apartment through a closed gallery. 
Upon entering the apartment, you step into the hallway, equipped with wardrobe space. To the right is the practical kitchen, equipped with an oven, induction hob and plenty of storage options. Adjacent is the utility room which is ideal for extra storage of household items. Walking down the corridor, you enter the spacious and bright living room, which offers direct access to the sunny balcony. From here, you can enjoy beautiful views over Amsterdam North. Through a second hallway, you reach both bedrooms: one at the front and one at the back of the apartment. In the middle are the wet areas, including the separate toilet room and the bathroom, equipped with a shower, washbasin and a connection for the washing machine.

The asking price does not include the private parking space in the adjacent building. It is preferred to sell the parking space together with the flat. 
The asking price for the parking space is € 25,000,- k.k. The monthly service costs are € 34,40.

Key Features:
- Built in 1974
- Living area: 80 m²
- Storage room in the basement (approx. 5 m²)
- Private covered parking space in a secured area
- Double glazing
- Heating via block heating
- Ground lease paid off until 2053
- Energy label C
- Two spacious bedrooms
- South-facing balcony
- Well-managed and active professional homeowners’ association (VvE)
- Service charges: € 234.93 per month, including heating costs

Location:
What truly makes this apartment special is its prime location. Situated in the heart of Amsterdam-Noord, this home offers convenience and accessibility. The Boven 't Y shopping center is just a short distance away, offering a wide range of shops and supermarkets, including Amazing Oriental, Decathlon, and MediaMarkt. For entertainment and dining, you’ll find the Pathé cinema, Coffee Company, and various restaurants at Foodcourt Market 27.
The North/South metro line—Noord station—is only a 5-minute walk away, providing quick access to the city center and Zuidas. Excellent public transport connections are available via the Olof Palmeplein bus stop. Prefer cycling? In under 15 minutes, you can reach one of the many ferry crossings over the IJ to Amsterdam-Centrum. The A10 ring road is just a 5-minute drive away, ensuring easy access to other parts of the city and beyond.
Looking to escape the city bustle? In just 15 minutes by bike, you’ll find yourself in the picturesque countryside of Landelijk Noord, with charming villages like Schellingwoude, Zunderdorp, Durgerdam, and Ransdorp, or surrounded by nature at Het Twiske. Closer to home, the Noorderpark, Baanakkerspark, and Vliegenbos invite you for a relaxing walk or a summer picnic.

Your New Home?
This apartment offers the perfect balance of urban energy and tranquil nature. Interested? Schedule a viewing today and discover all the benefits for yourself!

description:
Ruim en licht 3-kamerappartement met fantastisch balkon (23m²) en afgekochte erfpacht!

Welkom aan de Wijnand Nuijenstraat 132! Dit prachtige en energiezuinige 3-kamerappartement (87m²) op de eerste etage van een modern complex uit 2006 biedt alles wat u zoekt: ruimte, comfort en een ideale ligging in het bruisende Amsterdam Nieuw-West. Met een heerlijk zonnig balkon op het zuidwesten, een afgesloten parkeerplaats en een eigen berging, hoeft u nergens meer naar om te kijken!

Perfecte ligging en uitstekende bereikbaarheid
Dit appartement ligt in een levendige buurt met veel groen en tal van voorzieningen binnen handbereik. Op loopafstand vindt u diverse winkels, gezellige restaurants en hippe koffietentjes. Ook het Rembrandtpark en Sloterplas zijn vlakbij; perfect voor een ontspannen wandeling of sportieve activiteit.

Reist u veel met het openbaar vervoer? Dan zit u hier helemaal goed! Op slechts een paar minuten lopen vindt u station Lelylaan met een directe treinverbinding naar Schiphol en het Centraal Station. Daarnaast zijn er meerdere tram- en buslijnen die u snel door de stad brengen. Met de auto bent u binnen enkele minuten op de A10. Kortom, een toplocatie voor zowel forenzen als stadsliefhebbers!

Comfortabel en energiezuinig wonen
Dit appartement is volledig geïsoleerd en heeft energielabel A. Dat betekent een lagere energierekening en een duurzaam huis waarin u het hele jaar door geniet van een aangename temperatuur. De VvE wordt professioneel beheerd en alle benodigde documenten zijn aanwezig om zonder zorgen een hypotheekaanvraag te doen.

Een woning met sfeer en luxe
Bij binnenkomst valt direct de lichte en ruime opzet van de woning op. De royale woonkamer is heerlijk licht dankzij de grote schuifpui naar het balkon, waar u de hele dag door van de zon kunt genieten. De open keuken sluit perfect aan op de eethoek, zodat u gezellig kunt tafelen en daarna lekker kunt ontspannen met een film.

De twee ruime slaapkamers bieden volop mogelijkheden. Beide kamers hebben toegang tot het balkon, waardoor u elke dag wakker wordt met een frisse bries en een mooie lichtinval.

Luxe badkamer en toilet
De recent gerenoveerde badkamer straalt luxe uit met een stijlvolle inloopdouche, elegante tegels en een grote wasbak met verlichte spiegel. Het aparte toilet is in dezelfde verfijnde stijl uitgevoerd en zorgt voor extra gemak.

Extra's die het afmaken

Eeuwigdurend afgekochte erfpacht: geen zorgen over extra kosten!

Afgesloten parkeerplaats te huur en eigen berging

Zonnig balkon van maar liefst 23m²

Toplocatie met uitstekende OV-verbindingen

Professioneel beheerde VvE

Bent u op zoek naar een ruim, licht en instapklaar appartement met een topligging? Plan dan snel een bezichtiging en ervaar zelf het wooncomfort van Wijnand Nuijenstraat 132!

Spacious and Bright 3-Room Apartment with Fantastic Balcony (23m²) with bought off leasehold!

Welcome to Wijnand Nuijenstraat 132! This beautiful and energy-efficient 3-room apartment (87m²) on the first floor of a modern complex from 2006 offers everything you are looking for: space, comfort, and an ideal location in the vibrant Amsterdam Nieuw-West. With a wonderfully sunny southwest-facing balcony, a secured parking space, and a private storage room, you have nothing to worry about!

Perfect Location and Excellent Accessibility
This apartment is situated in a lively neighborhood with plenty of greenery and numerous amenities within reach. Within walking distance, you will find various shops, cozy restaurants, and trendy coffee spots. The nearby Rembrandt Park and Sloterplas are perfect for a relaxing walk or outdoor activities.

Do you frequently use public transport? Then this location is ideal! Just a few minutes' walk takes you to Lelylaan Station, offering direct train connections to Schiphol Airport and Central Station. Additionally, multiple tram and bus lines provide quick access throughout the city. By car, you are on the A10 highway within minutes. In short, a prime location for both commuters and city lovers!

Comfortable and Energy-Efficient Living
This apartment is fully insulated and holds energy label A. This means lower energy bills and a sustainable home where you can enjoy a pleasant indoor climate all year round. The homeowners' association (VvE) is professionally managed, and all necessary documents are available for a smooth mortgage application.

A Home with Atmosphere and Luxury
Upon entering, the spacious and bright layout of the apartment immediately catches your eye. The large living room is beautifully illuminated thanks to the large doors leading to the balcony, where you can enjoy the sun all day long. The open kitchen seamlessly connects to the dining area, making it perfect for social gatherings before unwinding with a movie.

The two spacious bedrooms offer plenty of possibilities. Both rooms have direct access to the balcony, allowing you to wake up every morning with a fresh breeze and abundant natural light.

Luxurious Bathroom and Toilet
The recently renovated bathroom exudes luxury with a stylish walk-in shower, elegant tiles, and a large sink with an illuminated mirror. The separate toilet follows the same refined design, adding extra convenience.

Additional Features That Make It Stand Out

Perpetually bought-off leasehold: no extra costs to worry about!

Secured parking space for rent and private storage room

Sunny 23m² balcony

Prime location with excellent public transport connections

Professionally managed homeowners' association

Are you looking for a spacious, bright, and move-in-ready apartment in a prime location? Schedule a viewing now and experience the comfort of Wijnand Nuijenstraat 132 for yourself!

description:
Op eeuwigdurend afgekochte erfpachtgrond gelegen, compleet in 2019 gerenoveerd 4-kamer appartement op de 7de verdieping met twee balkons en een prachtig vrij uitzicht over de Sloterplas!

Dit 4-kamer appartement van 91m² is gelegen in een kleinschalig complex en heeft fantastische ligging aan de Sloterplas. Vanuit het appartement heb je fraaie vergezichten aan de voorzijde over de Sloterplas en aan de achterzijde over het Piet Wiedijkpark. Maar dit is niet alles, van binnen is het appartement in 2019 compleet gerenoveerd. Een greep uit de werkzaamheden die destijds zijn verricht; er is een nieuwe moderne keuken en badkamer geplaatst, het toilet is gerenoveerd, het leidingwerk is ingefreesd, wanden en plafonds zijn gestuukt en er is een nieuwe laminaatvloer gelegd. Ten slotte, betaal je nooit meer voor erfpacht. De eigenaar heeft immers de erfpacht voor eeuwigdurend afgekocht.

Kortom; een schitterend gemoderniseerd appartement met fraaie vergezichten over de omgeving en de Sloterplas!

Omgeving en bereikbaarheid
De woning is gelegen in Amsterdam Nieuw-West, een populaire bestemming voor mensen die in het centrum van Amsterdam werken. Het stadsdeel staat namelijk bekend om de gunstige ligging ten opzichte van openbaar vervoer naar het centrum van Amsterdam, diverse voorzieningen, faciliteiten en parken. Zo bevinden zich in de directe woonomgeving winkels, scholen, recreatiegebieden, parken en sportverenigingen. 
Voor de dagelijkse boodschappen bevindt zich op loopafstand het Sierplein met supermarkten en andere winkeltjes en iedere woensdag de Siermarkt. Daarnaast ligt het winkelcentrum aan het Osdorpplein om de hoek, voor de dagelijkse boodschappen, restaurants en het theater “De Meervaart” voor culturele ontspanning. 
Voor recreatie en vertier bevinden zich op korte loopafstand de Sloterplas en het Hondenpark. Aan de zuidwestoever van de Sloterplas kan heerlijk worden gewandeld aan de boulevard en het stadsstrand. 
Op 10 minuten fietsafstand bevinden zich verder het Vondelpark en het centrum van Amsterdam. De ligging ten opzichte van openbaar vervoer is ook zeer gunstig. Zo bevindt zich op 4 minuten fietsen treinstation Lelylaan. Hier is de trein te nemen naar o.a. Amsterdam Centraal, Sloterdijk, Schiphol en Den Haag. Vanaf station Lelylaan vertrekt ook de metro in meerdere richtingen. Tramlijn 1, 17 en diverse busverbindingen zijn om de hoek. Eveneens zijn op zeer korte afstand de uitvalswegen A4, A9, A10 en luchthaven Schiphol. Rondom het complex zijn voldoende parkeergelegenheden.

Indeling
Begane grond
Centrale afgesloten hal met bellentableau, brievenbussen, lift, trapportaal en de 5,6m² grootte eigen berging voorzien van elektra.

Zevende verdieping
Entree in de hal. Aan de linkerzijde bevindt zich de meterkast en een handige wasruimte voorzien van aansluiting voor wasmachine en droger. Rechts is er toegang tot de royale woonkamer. Deze is heerlijk licht door de gunstige zonligging en grote raamkozijnen in voor- en achtergevel. Aan de voorzijde ligt de moderne halfopen keuken, welke is uitgevoerd in hoekopstelling en beschikt over Siemens inbouwapparatuur, waaronder: 5-pits gasfornuis, combioven, koel-vriescombinatie, vaatwasser en afzuigkap. In de keuken is er genoeg ruimte om een eettafel te plaatsen. Via een schuifdeur is er toegang tot het balkon op het noordwesten. Hier is het genieten van het bijna panoramische uitzicht over de Sloterplas. Middels een tweede kleine hal is de eerste ruime slaapkamer aan de voorzijde van de woning te bereiken. Deze kamer biedt genoeg ruimte voor een tweepersoonsbed, bureau en kledingkast. Eveneens is via de hal de fraaie badkamer voorzien van inloopdouche, wastafelmeubel en radiator en de separate toiletruimte voorzien van wandcloset en fontein te betreden. Aan de achterzijde bevindt zich een tweede slaapkamer. Deze biedt ook genoeg ruimte voor een tweepersoonsbed en via een schuifdeur is er toegang tot het tweede balkon op het zonnige zuidoosten. Hier is het heerlijk vertoeven met een hapje of drankje in de zon! Ten slotte, is er via de ruime hal nog toegang tot een derde ruime slaapkamer. Deze kamer heeft eveneens genoeg ruimte voor een tweepersoonsbed, bureau en kledingkast.

Located on perpetually purchased leasehold land, completely in 2019 renovated 4-room apartment on the 7th floor with two balconies and a beautiful unobstructed view over the Sloterplas!

This 4-room apartment of 91m² is located in a small-scale complex and has a fantastic location near the Sloterplas. From the apartment you have beautiful views at the front over the Sloterplas and at the rear over the Piet Wiedijkpark. But that's not all; the apartment was completely renovated from inside in 2019. A selection of the work that has been done include a new modern kitchen and bathroom were installed, the toilet was renovated, the plumbing was milled in, walls and ceilings were plastered and a new laminate floor was laid. Finally, you never pay for leasehold again. After all, the owner has bought off the leasehold in perpetuity.

In short; a beautifully modernized apartment with stunning views over the area and the Sloterplas!

Surroundings and accessibility
The property is located in Amsterdam Nieuw-West, a popular destination for people working in the city center of Amsterdam. The district is known for its convenient location with public transport links to central Amsterdam, various amenities, facilities, and parks. Nearby, you'll find shops, schools, recreational areas, parks, and sports clubs.
For daily groceries, the Sierplein is within walking distance, offering supermarkets and other shops, along with the Siermarkt every Wednesday. The Osdorpplein shopping center is also nearby for daily shopping, restaurants, and the "De Meervaart" theater for cultural entertainment.
For recreation and entertainment, the Sloterplas and the Hondenpark are within walking distance. You can enjoy walking along the boulevard and the city beach on the southwest shore of Sloterplas.
The Vondelpark and the center of Amsterdam are also a 10-minute bike ride away. The location in relation to public transport is also very favorable. For example, the Lelylaan train station is a 4-minute bike ride away. Here you can take the train to Amsterdam Central, Sloterdijk, Schiphol and The Hague. The metro also leaves from Lelylaan station in several directions. Tram lines 1, 17 and various bus connections are around the corner. The A4, A9, A10 and Schiphol airport highways are also very close by. There are plenty of parking spaces around the complex.

Ground floor
Communal hall with doorbells and intercom, mailboxes, elevator, staircase and the 5.6m² private storage room with electricity.

Seventh floor
Entrance in the hall. On the left you will find the meter cupboard and a handy laundry room with connection for washing machine and dryer. On the right is access to the spacious living room. The living is wonderfully light due to the favorable sun position and large window frames in the front and rear facade. At the front you will find the modern semi-open kitchen, which is designed in a corner layout and has Siemens built-in appliances, including: 5-burner gas stove, combination oven, fridge-freezer combination, dishwasher and extractor hood. There is enough space in the kitchen to place a dining table. A sliding door provides access to the balcony on the northwest. Here you can enjoy the almost panoramic view over the Sloterplas. The first spacious bedroom at the front of the house can be reached through a second small hall. This room offers enough space for a double bed, desk and wardrobe. The beautiful bathroom with walk-in shower, washbasin and radiator and the separate toilet room with wall mounted toilet and washbasin can also be entered through the hall. At the rear is a second bedroom. This also offers enough space for a double bed and a sliding door provides access to the second balcony on the sunny southeast. Here you can relax with a snack or drink in the sun! Finally, there is access to a third spacious bedroom via the spacious hall. This room also has enough space for a double bed, desk and wardrobe.

description:
Discover this stunning LOFT apartment, largely renovated in 2020-2021, located on the beloved Lijnbaansgracht in a characteristic and beautifully converted former warehouse. This unique apartment combines historical charm with modern living comfort and offers a generous living space of no less than 193 m² (approx. 2,077 sq ft) on a single level.

Although situated in the vibrant Jordaan district with all desired amenities, you will experience an oasis of tranquility and privacy within the home. The idyllic surrounding canals are part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site.
The apartment was extensively renovated under architectural supervision by Firm Architects in 2020-2021, with great attention to detail and the use of top-quality materials. With three spacious bedrooms that can be flexibly utilized, this apartment offers ample living space for everyone.

LAYOUT:
Upon entering, you reach the apartment's generous living area through the hallway. At the front, you can enjoy a delightful, expansive view over the Lijnbaansgracht. The French doors to the Juliet balcony are open here for much of the year. The modern, fully equipped open kitchen is ideal for those who love cooking and entertaining. From a Quooker boiling water tap to a spacious wine climate cabinet, from an American-style refrigerator to a combination steam oven, all necessary built-in appliances are present.

At the very quiet rear of the apartment, there are two spacious bedrooms and a third room that can be utilized multifunctionally. This space is ideal as an office or as an exceptionally comfortable baby or children's room. There are two bathrooms, with the main bathroom fully finished with Italian design. Additionally, there is a spacious walk-in wardrobe, and the unique tailor-made designer lighting elements immediately catch the eye.

LOCATION:
This beautiful LOFT apartment is practically in the heart of the Jordaan, right around the corner from the Rozengracht and close to the Elandsgracht, both well-known shopping streets. In the immediate vicinity, you'll also find the Noordermarkt, the famous Nine Streets, and the Westermarkt. Here, you'll discover various modern shopping streets with exclusive and trendy specialty shops, numerous art galleries, coffee bars, and delicatessen stores.
For a cocktail or aperitif, you can visit establishments such as ELA Restobar and Bar Oldenhof within walking distance, and in the summer, enjoy the sunset at Waterkant. For a delightful dinner, atmospheric restaurants like Balthasar’s Keuken, Santi & Santini, Bar Parry, and Mesiba are just around the corner. Additionally, all amenities such as supermarkets, sports and yoga studios, and dry cleaners are also within walking distance, and the highly regarded Daycare De Platanen and the 14th Montessori School De Jordaan are located on the adjacent Elandsstraat.

SPECIAL FEATURES:
- Quiet canal apartment in a highly sought-after and vibrant area of Amsterdam
- A generous 193 m² (approx. 2,077 sq ft) of living space on a single floor
- Largely renovated in 2020-2021 by Firm Architects, using high-quality materials
- Stunning parquet flooring (Chevron pattern) installed throughout the entire apartment
- 3 spacious bedrooms
- 2 bathrooms
- Possibility to obtain a parking permit on the street and access to Q-Park parking garage
- Mooring for a small boat right at your doorstep (first come first serve basis)
- Small-scale, active Homeowners' Association (VvE) with 3 members; monthly service costs amount to €...
- Low monthly energy consumption relative to the size of the apartment
- Situated on freehold land
- Spacious and neat entrance with bicycle storage

Luxe wonen met adembenemend uitzicht over Amsterdam!

Wakker worden met een panoramisch uitzicht over de stad? Zeer net 4-kamer appartement op de 15e verdieping van het prestigieuze Rembrandtpark Residences maakt het mogelijk!  
Met een ruim balkon, een eigen parkeerplaats in de afgesloten parkeergarage en een toplocatie binnen de Ring van Amsterdam biedt deze woning het ultieme woongenot.

Indeling
Bij binnenkomst in de ruime hal tref je direct het washok, een separaat modern toilet en de luxe badkamer, voorzien van een dubbele wastafel en een inloopdouche. 
Vanuit de hal zijn ook twee ruime slaapkamers te bereiken.
De zeer riante woonkamer met aangrenzende eetkamer en moderne keuken biedt een heerlijke open leefruimte. Vanuit hier stap je zo het royale balkon op, waar je kunt genieten 
van een fantastisch uitzicht over het Rembrandtpark richting het Centrum van Amsterdam.
Daarnaast beschikt het appartement over twee separate bergingen én een eigen parkeerplaats in de afgesloten parkeergarage onder het complex.

Locatie
Dit appartement bevindt zich in ‘Rembrandt Residence’, een goed onderhouden appartementencomplex met een eigen huismeester. 
De ligging binnen de Ring A10 is in meerdere opzichten ideaal. Direct grenzend aan het groene en veelzijdige Rembrandtpark geniet je hier van een oase van rust midden in de stad. 
Dit prachtig onderhouden park leent zich perfect voor wandelen, sporten en ontspannen – of zelfs een gezellige picknick of barbecue.

Voor gezinnen is er volop speelplezier dankzij de kinderboerderij en bouwspeelplaats. Daarnaast vind je op loopafstand kinderdagverblijven, scholen, sportscholen, 
supermarkten en diverse winkels. Met tal van gezellige eetgelegenheden in de buurt en het Vondelpark op slechts 10 minuten lopen, heb je alle voordelen van de stad binnen handbereik.

Binnen 15 minuten fietsen sta je in het bruisende centrum, met hotspots zoals het Leidseplein en Museumplein. Bovendien is de bereikbaarheid uitstekend: 
de ringweg A10 en het openbaar vervoer zijn dichtbij en Schiphol ligt op nog geen 15 minuten rijden. Kortom, een toplocatie met het beste van beide werelden: stadse dynamiek én groene rust!

Bijzonderheden
- 97 m2 woonoppervlakte (NEN2580 gemeten)
- Spectaculair uitzicht over heel Amsterdam
- Ruim en licht dankzij de hoge ligging
- Erfpacht afgekocht t/m 15 september 2094
- Servicekosten bedragen € 275,- per maand exclusief een voorschot op de stookkosten
- Energielabel C
- Keurige afwerking en moderne voorzieningen
- Eigen parkeerplaats in de afgesloten garage
- Royaal balkon met prachtig uitzicht over het park en het Centrum van Amsterdam
- 3 comfortabele slaapkamers
- 2 separate bergingen
- Liften aanwezig

Ben jij klaar om te wonen op een unieke plek met een fantastisch uitzicht? Mis deze kans niet en plan snel een bezichtiging!

*** UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY, RARELY FOR SALE! ***  LOCATED ON ONE OF AMSTERDAM’S MOST BEAUTIFUL, SUNNY QUAYS IN AN OASIS OF WATER AND TRANQUILITY *** PANORAMIC VIEWS FROM THIS 3-ROOM APARTMENT OF APPROX. 76 M² WITH A LARGE BALCONY OF APPROX. 9 M² AND INCLUDING A PRIVATE PARKING SPACE. LOCATED IN THE EASTERN DOCKLANDS ON JAVA ISLAND. ***

Many have been waiting for this—finally, an apartment on Javakade is available again. And what an apartment it is! Truly stunning, occupying the full width of the Javakade (meaning fantastic views from every room).

HIGHLIGHTS:

-A unique property website is available for this home. Download the brochure for the link to the website containing all the property details.
-Rarely comes on the market—a unique opportunity to live in one of the most beautiful and quietest locations in the city!
-Beautifully situated on the southwest-facing Javakade with fantastic views over the IJ Harbor.
-Because the apartment spans the full width of the quay, every room—including the kitchen—offers a view of the water (IJ Harbor).
-Southwest-facing balcony overlooking the Javakade.
-Large glass facade providing continuous water views and ample natural light.
-Enjoy both sunlight and stunning views.
-High ceilings of approximately 2.64 meters.
-Two well-sized bedrooms.
-Located on the 3rd floor, accessible by elevator.
-Private parking space in the underground garage, included in the asking price. The parking space is close to the apartment and already has infrastructure for an electric charging station.
-Separate, very large storage room of approximately 8 m² (!) in the basement.
-Energy label A+.
-Fiber optic internet connection.
-Peaceful environment (only local traffic), offering space and water just a bridge away from Amsterdam’s city center! You can bike to Central Station in less than 8 minutes.

ADDITIONAL HIGHLIGHTS & FEATURES:
-Leasehold: The transition to perpetual leasehold under favorable conditions has already been arranged! The leasehold for the apartment is prepaid until February 1, 2047, so no annual lease payments until then. After 2047, the indexed annual lease payment will be €1,971.63 (indexation 2025).
-The leasehold for the parking space has been fully bought off in perpetuity!
-The spacious private parking space is accessible by both elevator and stairs.
-The building was constructed around 1998, offering modern construction and excellent insulation.
-District heating, making the apartment gas-free.
-Mechanical ventilation renewed in 2023.
-Part of an active and financially healthy homeowners’ association (VvE) with a maintenance plan (MJOP). There are separate VvEs for the apartment and parking space.
-Monthly service charges: €241.35 for the apartment €40.10 for the parking space.

JAVA ISLAND: AN EXTENSION OF AMSTERDAM'S CANAL BELT
Between 1997 and 2000, this former harbor island in the Eastern Docklands was transformed into one of the city’s most sought-after residential areas, right next to the city center. Designed under the strict supervision of renowned architect Sjoerd Soeters, the vision was clear—Java Island was to be a modern interpretation and continuation of the historic canal belt, featuring a diverse architectural style that appears as though it was not built all at once.

Many top architects contributed to this vision. The main canals are naturally the IJ and IJ Harbor, but Java Island is also intersected by four cross-canals, lined with a mix of large and small canal houses. Just like the 17th-century canal belt, the plan included beautiful inner courtyards, designed by landscape architects.

Java Island was such a huge success that it became the blueprint for many modern urban developments in the Netherlands and abroad. Notably, Sjoerd Soeters used the Java Island model to transform the old harbor area of Copenhagen! Many believe that Java Island will eventually gain monumental status.

JUST ONE BRIDGE AWAY FROM THE HEART OF AMSTERDAM!
Java Island is directly connected to the city via the Jan Schaefer Bridge, providing easy access by car, public transport, and bicycle. You can cycle to Central Station in about 8 minutes and reach the Jordaan in approximately 15 minutes.

Future municipal plans also include a new cycling bridge at the tip of Java Island, connecting it to Amsterdam North.

Shops and amenities are within walking and cycling distance, including:

Shopping center "Brazilië"
Various delicatessens Numerous restaurants such as Restaurant Einde van de Wereld (located diagonally across from the apartment), Zeeuw & Schot, and Taparia Cultural attractions like the Muziekgebouw aan 't IJ and Pakhuis De Zwijger

description:
Lange Vonder 229 – Groot wonen in een groene-, unieke- en goed bereikbare buurt

Deze uitgebouwde woning biedt verrassend veel ruimte en is uitstekend onderhouden door de eerste eigenaren. Met de mogelijkheid om maar liefst zes slaapkamers te realiseren, is dit een ideale woning als je op zoek bent naar extra ruimte, bijvoorbeeld voor een groot gezin of een thuiswerkplek.

Je geniet hier van een zeer zonnige tuin en een ruim dakterras. Bovendien is er de mogelijkheid om het dakterras bij de woning te betrekken, wat extra woonruimte kan opleveren.

Dankzij energielabel B heb je lage stookkosten. De begane grond is voorzien van vloerverwarming, wat zorgt voor extra comfort. Daarnaast is het schilderwerk aan de buitenzijde ongeveer 1,5 jaar geleden uitgevoerd en is het platte dak vernieuwd in 2020. De woning heeft een moderne badkamer en een ruime, nette keuken, waardoor je zonder grote aanpassingen direct comfortabel kunt wonen.

Ook financieel biedt deze woning een groot voordeel. De erfpachtcanon is afgekocht tot 2042 en er is succesvol gebruik gemaakt van de spijtoptantenregeling. Hierdoor kun je de erfpacht eeuwigdurend afkopen voor slechts €14.350,79. Kies je hier niet voor, dan bedraagt de canon na 2042 €758,26 per jaar.

Kortom, een ruime en veelzijdige woning die van alle gemakken is voorzien. 

En dit is slechts een kleine greep uit de elementen die deze woning jou te bieden heeft!

Dan nog even over de locatie. 

Twiske-West is een groene en kindvriendelijke wijk in Amsterdam, waar je geniet van rust en ruimte, terwijl alle stedelijke voorzieningen binnen handbereik zijn. De wijk is ruim opgezet met brede straten, veel speelplekken en veilige fiets- en wandelpaden, wat het een ideale woonomgeving maakt voor gezinnen.

In de directe omgeving vind je meerdere basisscholen, kinderopvang en sportverenigingen. Voor de dagelijkse boodschappen kun je terecht bij de nabijgelegen winkelcentra, en voor ontspanning ligt natuurgebied Het Twiske praktisch om de hoek. Hier kun je heerlijk wandelen, fietsen of genieten van de natuur met het hele gezin.

Daarnaast is de bereikbaarheid uitstekend. Met de fiets of bus ben je snel in het centrum van Amsterdam, en via de nabijgelegen uitvalswegen rijd je gemakkelijk naar andere delen van de stad of regio. De ringweg A10 en andere hoofdwegen zijn eenvoudig bereikbaar. Ook de NDSM-werf en de pont naar het centrum liggen op korte afstand, waardoor je in no-time in hartje Amsterdam staat.

Twiske-West biedt de perfecte combinatie van groen, rust en voorzieningen, waardoor het een ideale plek is om te wonen en op te groeien.

Deze locatie biedt een praktische en prettige woonomgeving met alle gemakken van de stad binnen handbereik.

Ben jij enthousiast? Plan dan snel een afspraak in met Van Overbeek Makelaars en wij laten je tijdens een uitgebreide rondleiding zien waarom dit jouw nieuwe woning wordt! 

Voor de indeling verwijzen wij je graag door naar de plattegronden van de woning. 

Tot snel!

description:
Welcome to this beautiful apartment, featuring its own terrace that guarantees privacy and tranquility. The apartment is fully equipped with underfloor heating and has an energy label A, ensuring sustainability and low monthly costs. The open kitchen and light-colored concrete floors make this apartment a true gem.

Layout: 
Via the shared entrance with elevator, you reach the first floor, where you enter through your own door and spacious terrace, a peaceful outdoor area offering great privacy. The terrace provides access to the living room, where large windows offer a stunning view of your own outdoor space. The living room is finished with an elegant concrete floor and opens into a modern open kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped with a 4-burner gas stove, extractor hood, dishwasher, combi-oven, and fridge-freezer, perfect for home cooking. Underfloor heating provides additional comfort throughout the apartment.

The hallway offers extra privacy with a separate guest toilet and sink. There is also a convenient storage closet with the central heating system and washing machine connections. The spacious bedroom is a peaceful retreat, with large windows allowing plenty of sunlight. Thanks to the excellent insulation, there is no noise disturbance, ensuring a restful night’s sleep. There’s more than enough space for multiple large wardrobes for all your belongings. The same light-colored concrete floor runs throughout the bedroom, giving the space a harmonious look and creating a beautiful, cohesive atmosphere. The bathroom is a luxurious space, featuring a modern walk-in rain shower with a thermostatic mixer, built-in ceiling lights, and an elegant vanity unit.

Outside the terrace, you’ll find a shared inner courtyard, a great place to relax or stay active. You can enjoy the gym rack, green artificial grass, or sit at the picnic tables. It’s the perfect space to be outdoors, whether you want to exercise or just enjoy the peace. It’s also a wonderful opportunity to get to know your neighbors better, as a good neighbor is always better than a distant friend!

Surroundings: 
Nieuwpoortstraat in Amsterdam West offers a vibrant and diverse living environment, surrounded by many cozy restaurants and cafes. For a delicious lunch or fresh coffee, you can visit Farine Boulangerie & Café, a charming French bakery, or Friedhats FUKU Café for a tasty and unique experience. Healthy options can be found at Samen - Lunch and Juices, where you can enjoy fresh juices and nutritious dishes. Art lovers can visit No Man’s Art Gallery & Bar, where art and drinks come together perfectly. For a stylish night out, LUPE is a popular choice, and Abbey is ideal for a more relaxed drink. Not to forget, Cantine Caron, a romantic brasserie perfect for an intimate lunch or dinner, is also nearby. Westerpark, just a few minutes’ walk away, offers a beautiful green space where you can walk, exercise, or simply unwind. Thanks to the proximity of these parks, green areas, and delightful dining and drinking spots, you always have the option to leave the hustle and bustle of the city behind and enjoy nature and atmosphere, all within reach.

Accessibility: 
Nieuwpoortstraat is excellently accessible, both by public transport and by car. Public transport connections are great, with Sloterdijk Station nearby. This station offers direct train and metro connections, allowing you to reach the center of Amsterdam or other parts of the city quickly. Additionally, there are several tram and bus stops in the vicinity, making it easy to explore the city or commute to work. The tram stop is just a few minutes' walk away.

By car, Nieuwpoortstraat is easily accessible via the A10 Ring Road and the A5, allowing you to quickly travel out of the city toward other major cities in the Netherlands. The highways are easily reachable, making it ideal for those who travel outside Amsterdam regularly. Both public transport and good access by car ensure that you can always navigate the area easily, whether you want to explore the city or travel further afield.

VvE: 
The VvE, managed by Newomij, is well-prepared for future maintenance and has a Multi-Year Maintenance Plan (MJOP) and a house rules document. Every year, a meeting is held to discuss important matters. The VvE costs are €92,41 per month.

Ownership Situation: 
The ground lease has been bought out until November 30, 2060.

Special Features:

- Energy label A
- Living area of 49 m²
- Spacious terrace with great privacy
- Active VvE
- Service charges of €92,41 per month
- Notary choice for the buyer (provided the purchase agreement is in line with the Ring Model and in Amsterdam)
- Non-owner-occupied clause applies
- A contract is only valid once the purchase agreement has been signed

description:
Beautiful luxuriously finished 3-room flat of 91 m² with spacious terrace on the sunny south. The asking price includes parking in the underground car park.
Built in 2018, the complex is spacious with a pleasant reception hall and spacious corridors throughout. The property has underfloor heating and is fully equipped with HR++ glass. This results in an energy label A and low heating costs, ideal for both comfort and sustainability. 

Sellers' note: 
Our time has come to leave this delightful place. As first-time residents, we made wonderful memories here. For us, this house and this place was the perfect combination between bustling Amsterdam (Oost) with all its amenities and, in addition, the peace and security offered by the apartment complex. We thoroughly enjoyed the numerous restaurants, bars and many sports and shopping facilities around the corner. Even when we had a baby, this remained the perfect environment for us with green parks, playgrounds, football pitches, the little pool in Oosterpark, the Jaap Edenbaan and petting zoo in Watergraafsmeer. We will greatly miss the sunny days on our terrace and the neighbourhood. We hope the next residents will enjoy this place as much as we do!

Layout: Via the lift or stairs, you reach the third floor, where you enter the flat. The hall provides access to all rooms and the entire house has a sleek cast floor. The spacious living room with half-open kitchen is a bright and open space, ideal for cosy evenings or quiet moments. The French doors offer access to the sunny south-facing terrace, a great place to enjoy the sun. The flat is located on the inner courtyard of the complex, making it nice and quiet in the evening and at night. The luxury kitchen is fully equipped, including a combi oven-microwave, dishwasher, fridge, freezer, quooker, induction hob and extractor, all top brands. A switch in the kitchen controls the WTW system for optimal mechanical ventilation. Two spacious bedrooms, one of which has a handy built-in wardrobe. The other bedroom is large enough to also accommodate a desk as a home office.
The modern bathroom has a spacious walk-in shower, a washbasin with beautiful wooden vanity unit and a natural stone basin. There are also mechanical ventilation supply and extraction points here. There is more than enough space to install a bath if required. The separate toilet has a washbasin. 

In the spacious hallway - besides a coat rack, of course - a pram, shopping trolley or shoe cabinet can easily fit while there is also enough space for a cupboard for extra storage. The apartment has a laundry room with washing machine and dryer connections. In addition, the central heating boiler (Intergas, 2018) and the heat exchanger (Zehnder WHR930) are located here. In the underground car park, you have access to a parking space and a spacious storage room equipped with electricity. 
With the car, you open the gate to the inner courtyard of the complex by means of an electric handheld transmitter, providing a pleasant sense of security. There is always parking space in front of the door for visitors (as no parking permits are issued in the immediate vicinity), while your own car is always safe and sheltered in its own spot in the parking garage. 

Surroundings: The location of this flat is truly ideal! Located in the vibrant and sought-after Oostpoort district, it is in the middle of the Oostpoort shopping area and close to the lively Middenweg, Linnaeusstraat and Javastraat. Daily shopping is easy, with a wide range of specialty shops, supermarkets and unique boutiques right next door. For relaxation, visit the many cosy pubs, cafés, restaurants and large terraces along the water, with brewery Poesiat & Kater and The Cottage literally around the corner. In addition, three city parks, including Oosterpark, Park Frankendael and Flevopark, are a very short distance away for the necessary tranquillity and nature.
The flat is easily accessible by public transport: Muiderpoort Station is a 3-minute walk away with direct train connection to the centre of Amsterdam in just one stop. Tram lines 3, 14 and 19 stop within walking distance. The A10 ring road can be reached within 5 minutes via Middenweg.
In short, this flat offers not only luxury, space and comfort, but also a fantastic location in one of Amsterdam's most popular neighbourhoods!
